member.summary: Gets or creates the convention builder for the specified controller action method.

The name of the action method.
The optional array of action method argument types.
member.remarks: The specified method name must refer to a public, non-static action method. If there is only one corresponding match found, then the argument types are ignored; otherwise, the argument types are used for method overload resolution. Action methods that have the applied will also be ignored.

The current type substitution context.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.IModelTypeBuilder
member.summary: Defines the behavior of a model type builder.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.IModelTypeBuilder.NewStructuredType(Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmStructuredType,System.Type,Microsoft.Web.Http.ApiVersion,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmModel)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new structured type given the specified structured type, CLR type, and API version.
member.param: The structured type to evaluate.
The CLR type mapped to the structured type.
The API version associated with the type mapping.
The EdmModel the structured type belongs to.
member.returns: The original CLR type or a new, dynamically generated substitute type that is a subset of the original CLR type, but maps one-to-one with the structured type.
member.remarks: If a substitution is not required, the original CLR type is returned. When a substitution type is generated, it is performed only once per API version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.OData.IModelTypeBuilder.NewActionParameters(System.IServiceProvider,Microsoft.OData.Edm.IEdmAction,Microsoft.Web.Http.ApiVersion,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an returns a strongly-typed definition for OData action parameters.
member.param: The services needed to potentially substitute types.
The defining action.
The API version of the to create the parameter type for.
The name of the controller that defines the action. Necessary for generating unique parameter types.
member.returns: A strong type definition for the OData parameters.
member.remarks: OData action parameters are modeled as a dictionary, which is difficult to use effectively by documentation tools such as the API Explorer. The corresponding type is generated only once per API version.

member.summary: Determines whether the action should be considered.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions
member.content: Provides additional implementation specific to ASP.NET Web API.
member.summary: Represents the possible API versioning options for an OData API explorer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions.#ctor(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The current configuration associated with the options.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions.UseApiExplorerSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the API explorer settings are honored.
member.value: True if the is ignored; otherwise, false. The default value is false.
member.remarks: Most OData services inherit from the , which excludes the controller from the API explorer by setting to true. By setting this property to false, these settings are ignored instead of reapplying with a value of false to all OData controllers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions.UseQualifiedOperationNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether qualified names are used when building URLs for operations (e.g. actions and functions).
member.value: True if qualified names are used when building URLs for operations; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions.QueryOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the convention builder used to describe OData query options.
member.value: An OData query option convention builder.

member.name: T:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods for the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.AddODataApiExplorer(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Adds or replaces the configured API explorer with an implementation that supports OData and API versioning.
member.param: The configuration used to add the API explorer.
member.returns: The newly registered versioned OData API explorer.
member.remarks: This method always replaces the with a new instance of . This method also configures the to not use , which enables exploring all OData controllers without additional configuration.

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.AddODataApiExplorer(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration,System.Action{Microsoft.Web.Http.Description.ODataApiExplorerOptions})

member.param: The configuration used to add the API explorer.
An action used to configure the provided options.
member.returns: The newly registered versioned API explorer.
member.remarks: This method always replaces the with a new instance of .
